text:
Scope: Remote experiment control
Category: Experimentation
Q: Is it possible to remotely control my experiments at SNS or HFIR?
A: The remote experiment capability is available at SNS and HFIR. Please log in ORNL Analysis cluster at `analysis.sns.gov` using either web browser or Thinlinc. Go to `Applications` -> `Remote Experiments` and select your instrument. This will launch the connection to the remote experiment machine where we can launch a terminal and type `css` to start the EPICS instrument control software.
